title:
ITEM CODE # 229; SNAP STUD GUARD GIRTH WITH COLORED ELASTICS.

The girth's reinforced belly guard avoids...

attachments.displayName:
ITEM CODE # 229; SNAP STUD GUARD GIRTH WITH COLORED ELASTICS.

The girth's reinforced belly guard avoids any long term deformation occurring and allows better absorption in case of shock. The elastic sections on both sides make breathing easier for the horse.

Triple Layer elastic fixed onto stainless steel roller buckles & has central clip and two D-rings at each end of the girth makes the girthing to be softer and comfortable.

Fancy Stitching on belly provided with soft skin inner Lining makes this product very admirable. This Belly Pad girth offers a simple and practical use for every day riding. Its straight and the practical characteristics make it a nice product.

Available length: 110 cm (43"), 115 cm (45"), 120 cm (47"), 125 cm (49"), 130 cm (51"), 135 cm (53"), 140 cm (55"), 145 cm (57").

Available in Full, Cob or Pony Size in Black, Oak Bark (Reddish Brown) or Havana (Brown) Shade.

Visit our website www.royalsports88.com.
or contact us equestrian@royalsports88.com
